description: Automatically opens your browser to preview Node.js email messages sent with Nodemailer. Made for Lad!

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:lib
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run ava
scripts.test-coverage: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run nyc
